short_description: This function generates predictions on a response variable for a data set
long_description: This function uses a xgboost model from the td_xgboost function to create predictions on a response variable for a test set

input_tables.name: inputtable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the input test data.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input test data.

input_tables.name: ModelTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the model data.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the model data.

argument_clauses.name: IdColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies a column containing a unique identifier for each test point in the test set
argument_clauses.description: Specifies a column containing a unique identifier for each test point in the test set

argument_clauses.name: NumParallelTrees
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify number of boosted trees to be loaded from model table
argument_clauses.description: Specify number of boosted trees to be loaded from model table

argument_clauses.name: NumBoostRounds
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify number of iterations within a boosted trees to be loaded from model table
argument_clauses.description: Specify number of iterations within a boosted trees to be loaded from model table

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the input columns to copy to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the input columns to copy to the output table.

argument_clauses.name: ModelType
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify one of the following methods, precisely to change the output shcema of predictions for classification
argument_clauses.description: Specify one of the following methods, precisely to change the output shcema of predictions for classification

argument_clauses.name: Responses
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies responses for which to output probabilitites.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies responses for which to output probabilitites.

argument_clauses.name: Detailed
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies whether to output detailed information of each prediction.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether to output detailed information of each prediction.
